nodes.text: Technical Specifications: Spacecraft of the Imperium and the Rebel Alliance
Technical Specifications: Spacecraft of the Imperium and the Rebel Alliance was a top-secret publication of the Imperial Navy.
At least two versions of the publication existed. The earlier version was listed as Document Number V492771R225Y and the revised version was listed as Document Number V492771S18DQ.

Compiled by Captain Mordaph Clafdatha and Lieutenant Jord Kraas, it was a brief primer on the capabilities and specifications of selected Rebel and Imperial spacecraft. Prepared at the orders of Darth Vader, the publication's primary purpose was to catalog the strengths and weaknesses of these craft in order for Imperial starfighter pilots to prepare for battle against them. However, a copy of the document was acquired by the Rebels and was given to their pilots as a resource.
Many Imperial and Rebel starfighter pilots, such as Keyan Farlander and Maarek Stele, studied this book during their training.
"Name/Model#" as listed in the revised edition; entries marked with * are not found in the original version:
